post_title: "helicopter" hovering over one spot of anderlecht for the past 15 minutes

comments.author: NatNC
comments.body: Also wondering what's up. My son thinks it's Santa.

comments.author: MiniHopper
comments.body:
Schietpartij in Anderlecht: 1 dode, gewapende verdachte op de vlucht
https://www.vrt.be/vrtnws/nl/2024/12/22/schietpartij-in-anderlecht-2-gewonden-gewapende-verdachte-op-d/

comments.author: Angevil_
comments.body:
There has been heavy police deployment at Aumale.  
The helicopter has been hovering the same area since a few minutes after the police arrived, so probably related, but I do not know what happened at Aumale per se.

comments.body: I have also seen it! Seems to be gone now

comments.author: SmolTovarishch
comments.body:
My apologies then, I've just seen so much people questioning the sky for a minute. It looked like this was just one of them.

To answer your question: most likely a police helicopter, this happened a while back in October where a helicopter was also hoovering over the muntplein.
